Understate: The claim may understate the fact that President Trump did appoint minorities to the courts, as evidenced by the Florida GOP tweet that included photos of four of Trump's judicial picks, three of whom are minorities.
Lack enough support: The claim may lack enough support as it only mentions Kamala Harris's statement during the debate without providing additional evidence or data to back it up.
Problematic assumption: The claim may make a problematic assumption that appointing minorities to the courts refers only to Black judges, while the Florida GOP tweet highlights three minority judges who are not Black.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim may have an alternative explanation as the Florida GOP tweet suggests that Kamala Harris did not vote to confirm any of the judges nominated by President Trump, which could be a reason for her statement.
